entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Windy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023
